item.title: Regina add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "But because truly being here is so much; because everything here apparently needs us, this fleeting world, which in some strange way keeps calling to us. Us, the most fleeting of all." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Regina add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Regina add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "When angry, count four. When very angry, swear." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Regina add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I like to see people reunited, I like to see people run to each other, I like the kissing and the crying, I like the impatience, the stories that the mouth can't tell fast enough, the ears that aren't big enough, the eyes that can't take in all of the change, I like the hugging, the bringing together, the end of missing someone." -- Jonathan Safran Foer
